title: Jocuserious
author: Jocuserious
content: Which is the biggest meme coin yet? You can visit the cmc list if you want, and don't forget to name your profitable meme coin.I can share some name of top meme coin.ShibaDogecoinFlokiBabydogecoinPepeMona

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Dogecoin is the first meme coin.Shiba Inu is copycat from Dogecoin.Floki, Babydogecoin, and Mona are copycat from Shiba Inu.Pepe is first shitcoin run in BRC-20 chain.You're forget with Bone ShibaSwap, Dogelon Mars, Doge Killer, and Dejitaru Tsuka where all of them are shitcoins.If you want to buy meme coin, you should only choose in Dogecoin.

comments.author: RewFrew
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 21, 2023, 09:16:42 AMWhich is the biggest meme coin yet? You can visit the cmc list if you want, and don't forget to name your profitable meme coin.I can share some name of top meme coin.ShibaDogecoinFlokiBabydogecoinPepeMona I think Doge is largest meme coin in crypto currency market. Recently shiba played well but i think doge is best. I have huge memory with doge coin. And i am huge profited form doge coin. In 2017 when doge price was $0.0005 then i was bought $1300 doge coin and  i traded it after trading my fund were near about $5k. It was my biggest profit from crypto currency market. So i never forget doge coin. Doge coin gives me financial freedom. So i still love this meme coin.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Doge coin is the original meme coin which has been made just for fun only. The rest was just copy cat token that being issued as money grabber. Doge coin is also the biggest meme coin right now. There's no meme coin that can stand a chance to beat doge coin even shiba inu with its product will never able to surpass doge coin. Doge coin will remain a meme coin forever while the rest was just stupid meme token which issued in the another blockchain. Doge coin has its own blockchain and i would like to call that as the best meme coin that doesn't rely with the centralization of another blockchain. Another token can collapse once its parent blockchain will be also dead. That's why i would like to take doge coin as the most valuable meme coin right now. I see no reason to call another meme token as a competitor for doge coin. The marketcap can be manipulated by the whale but its history will never able to be repeated by another meme token in the market

comments.author: tsaroz
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 21, 2023, 09:16:42 AMWhich is the biggest meme coin yet? You can visit the cmc list if you want, and don't forget to name your profitable meme coin.I can share some name of top meme coin.ShibaDogecoinFlokiBabydogecoinPepeMonaDoge is the first and largest. It was one of the earliest coin coined as Meme coin as it was introduced to make people aware of cryptocurrency and mining. ShibaInu was it's mascot. Influenced by it, Shiba token came as a meme coin with controversial initial supply. A plethora of other tried to copy it, some a bit successful while most in vein. Pepe was the last meme token I missed that got a significant success and still holding. That's why I'm early into Pepemo. Hoping it would be to Pepe what babydoge is to dogecoin.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I expect that Doge coin is the largest among meme coins, as far as I know there is no total supply for the Doge coin.But at the moment Pepe is the most profitable I think. And don't forget Pepe2.In any case, this nonsense is not over, and more will appear.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: It's currently Shiba Inu's second Dogecoin and it's at the top, so what's this thread about sharing their profits from meme coins?All the meme coins were pumped and they created hype in the market with crazy gains up to thousands of percent, see from the ROI on Coinmarketcap.There are many lists of meme coins up to hundreds but only a few survive in the market with high market capitalization value, I just think of Dogecoin which is currently still at the top.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Doge wan't considered a memecoin until Elon troll with it. Shiba I think is the biggest as it was immediately added to Robinhood which the exchange even changed its meta description to favor SHIB for its marketing. Everybody in the big digital currency is shilling for this coin god knows what the reason is but look at how it is today, it still rank up at 18th in CMC. To this day people shills for it to win with its Shibarium launch. It evolved to a L1 and also embarking on privacy features and they even have $Bones.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 21, 2023, 09:16:42 AMWhich is the biggest meme coin yet? You can visit the cmc list if you want, and don't forget to name your profitable meme coin.I can share some name of top meme coin.ShibaDogecoinFlokiBabydogecoinPepeMonaNothing beats Dogecoin. Quote from: cabron on July 21, 2023, 05:21:14 PMDoge wan't considered a memecoin until Elon troll with it.Nope.It was known that it was a meme coin ever since and even before Elon tried to shill it through his Twitter account, Dogecoin was already labelled as is.Whilst Elon started the memecoin craze, that's when all of these dog(shiba) coins came out from that inspiration through Dogecoin.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 21, 2023, 09:16:42 AMWhich is the biggest meme coin yet? You can visit the cmc list if you want, and don't forget to name your profitable meme coin.I can share some name of top meme coin.ShibaDogecoinFlokiBabydogecoinPepeMonaI hate all of them but no doubt it's dogecoin.  Without dogecoin none of those coins would even exist.  And what the heck is baby dogecoin lol.  Is that even a thing?  The level of stupidity of people who throw theor money into thin air is amazing.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 21, 2023, 09:16:42 AMWhich is the biggest meme coin yet? You can visit the cmc list if you want, and don't forget to name your profitable meme coin.Well obviously dogecoin is the biggest meme project in the crypto space. It was the first meme project that was created and it also has the highest market cap of all meme coins. The next meme coin that was a success was Shiba Inu which came many years later and basically was just a copy of Dogecoin with a different name. This year we had Pepe which made quite a few early investors rich.We should not forget though that for every successful meme coin there are probably 10000 others that completely fail. So just stay away from shitcoins in general.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Dogecoin, in my own opinion. All below it or just duplicates of it trying to be like Dogecoin and rob the market of cryptocurrencies. Even the new one Pepe is just trying to repeat the success of Dogecoin even though it's just a meme coin. I would not trust any for a long-term asset. Better just play along, use them to milk some money, and then dump them away. Find a new one, buy it, sell it, and then leave it again. Don't ever fall in love with any of this, their market could easily fall any day or worse, any minute. At you sleep or while you are eating, they could be manipulated by whales and turn it to dust.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 21, 2023, 09:16:42 AMWhich is the biggest meme coin yet? You can visit the cmc list if you want, and don't forget to name your profitable meme coin.I can share some name of top meme coin.ShibaDogecoinFlokiBabydogecoinPepeMonaOf the ones you mentioned, I think the top 3 are Dogecoin, Shiba Inu and Pepe. And I also think that those three have high chances that they will also keep up during the bull run of Bitcoin. Apart from that, I think the Aidoge, and Caw look good and okay to hold until the bull run returns.. Anyway, this is just my observation.There is also the under of shiba inu, like Bonk, shibdao, because when the price value of Shib increases, the top coins under the network of Shib will also be pulled up for sure based on what I can see.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 21, 2023, 09:16:42 AMWhich is the biggest meme coin yet? You can visit the cmc list if you want, and don't forget to name your profitable meme coin.I can share some name of top meme coin.ShibaDogecoinFlokiBabydogecoinPepeMonaOf course we will go with the OG of them all which is Doge coin. And it has been like that for years until Elon Musk become the so called influencer and hype Doge. After that there are a lot of copycats including Shiba.But for now, I would say Pepe, it went viral and has huge followers and someone get rich instantly as the creator of this BRC-20 token. However, I think there could be more in the future, specially as we approach the bull run next year. Developers would fine another hype and creates meme coin for everyone to make money with.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 21, 2023, 09:16:42 AMWhich is the biggest meme coin yet? You can visit the cmc list if you want, and don't forget to name your profitable meme coin.For now if we look at the list of Meme category on CMC, then the biggest coin from the MC side is Dogecoin, the second is Shiba and the third is Pepe. And about my profitable meme coin is $PEPE, I was lucky enough to know the existence of this token earlier, even though I was not an early adopter, but it managed to earn up to x5+ of my total investment in this token. How about you?

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: cabron on July 21, 2023, 05:21:14 PMDoge wan't considered a memecoin until Elon troll with it. Shiba I think is the biggest as it was immediately added to Robinhood which the exchange even changed its meta description to favor SHIB for its marketing. Everybody in the big digital currency is shilling for this coin god knows what the reason is but look at how it is today, it still rank up at 18th in CMC. To this day people shills for it to win with its Shibarium launch. It evolved to a L1 and also embarking on privacy features and they even have $Bones. Doge doesn't have any purpose at the first it was created until it became a tipster token that is used on exchanges. I remember the days where I received a DOGE from an exchange as a tip to me and rain on that exchange public chat. The meme coin category was just popularized last bull market and everyone tries to copy it as they want to became part of the trend and until now, many useless meme coins has still being created. Everyone just want to make a profit that's why they are buying these useless coins.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: I thought it was USDT lol. Why do you ask such an obvious answer OP? Of course it is Dogecoin considering it's on the top 10, not surprising that Elon was likely the reason behind that it was put there. Moreover, it's the decentralized coin along with Bitcoin in that top 10 which in fact may surprise others that may not know.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: From DOGE, to SHIB and now PEPE, i think these three made a huge impact in a world of meme tokens.Anyway, they are still listed in the market and there’s still a chance for a pump probably they are just waiting for the next cycle of hype so if you’re a fan of a meme tokens, then this is your opportunity now to accumulate more especially now that we are heading into a possible bull run.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: When it comes to enemy coins I think it’s fairly obvious that the king will always be DOGE. It was created as nonsense and found its way to being Elon Musk’s darling even after the creator came out and said it was a scam. It was so successful that other meme coins were created like shiba just to ride its coattails with similar branding. I don’t gaf about doge, but it’s a funny story.

Seems you've invested in all and you still prefer doge to all.
